intro: Stenostelma capense, commonly known as the Cape stenostelma, is a succulent plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Aizoaceae, commonly referred to as the ice plant family. The plant is characterized by its fleshy, cylindrical stems and small, clustered flowers that range in color from white to pink. It thrives in arid environments and is adapted to store water in its thick, fleshy leaves. Stenostelma capense is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its unique appearance and low maintenance requirements.
